item.title: Simple HTTP Client - Server for ASCII Data
item.description: I wrote this back on January 21st 2024 for a coding assessment that I got. The code for the HTTP Client is shown below: import socket # Set the server IP address and port server_ip = 'ip_addr' server_port = 8080 # Set the path to the text file file_path = 'proprietary_data.txt' # Read ASCII data from the text file with open(file_path, 'r') as file: ascii_data = file.read() # Create a socket object client_socket = socket.
